name: The Mouse and the Giraffe
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #183 - Unconventional mode of transport.

Help the Mouse and the Giraffe collect Cheese!

Controls:

- Up and Down Arrow Keys to move

- SPACE to Select

Developed by Chelsea Joe.

Music created in Beepbox and sourced from Mixkit.

Font is Cardenio Modern by Nils Cordes.
